dct_title_s: Map of property of E.H. Hinners Sons and Estate of C.H. Meyer, Edgewater, N.J.
dct_description_sm: Map showing the property lines indicating riparian rights of the company E.H. Hinners Sons and the estate of C.H. Meyer, Edgewater, New Jersey
Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection
Lines of riparian rights as shown in full lines are as per map approved Jan 15, 1914 by Secretary of War
Dotted lines show grant from the State of New Jersey to Eide H.Hinners dated Feb. 14, 1895 and to Cord Henry Meyer dated May 24, 1893
